snippet: Former Robert Morris players said Mike Rice’s behavior never resembled “abuse” and they spoke positively about their time with him.
abstract: Five former players and staff members at Robert Morris University speak in interviews about former men's basketball coach Mike Rice; recall that he was short-tempered and intense but never abusive, as shown in video that recently cost him his job at Rutgers.
lead_paragraph: Former Robert Morris players said Mike Rice’s behavior never resembled “abuse” and they spoke positively about their time with him.

headline.seo: Ex-Rutgers Coach Mike Rice Recalled Positively by Some Ex-Players
headline.main: Some Former Players Recall Rice Positively
headline.print_headline: Some Former Players Recall Rice Positively

keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations
